body_html: @chengyangfu device side assert happens elsewhere, but you see a stack-trace over there. To get exact location of device-side assert, run your program with CUDA_LAUNCH_BLOCKING=1 python main.py (or whatever is the replacement for main.py in your case)
body_text: @chengyangfu device side assert happens elsewhere, but you see a stack-trace over there. To get exact location of device-side assert, run your program with CUDA_LAUNCH_BLOCKING=1 python main.py (or whatever is the replacement for main.py in your case)
body: @chengyangfu device side assert happens elsewhere, but you see a stack-trace over there. To get exact location of device-side assert, run your program with `CUDA_LAUNCH_BLOCKING=1 python main.py` (or whatever is the replacement for main.py in your case)
